thread.title: "We will not be silenced": Student survivors tell FL lawmakers

title: "We will not be silenced": Student survivors tell FL lawmakers
text:
"We will not be silenced": Student survivors tell FL lawmakers 1:02am IST - 01:58 
Students from Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School in Parkland, Florida, demanded that Florida lawmakers in Tallahassee on Wednesday act on gun control following last week's deadly school shooting that left seventeen people dead. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Students from Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School in Parkland, Florida, demanded that Florida lawmakers in Tallahassee on Wednesday act on gun control following last week's deadly school shooting that left seventeen people dead.
